concept.title: Customer Record Sources
concept.shortdesc: Learn about managing customer attribute data, creating customer record sources, and uploading the data. Information about the configuring customer attribute data files, creating the customer record sources, configure FTP attribute data files, and validating the schema.

conbody.p: In the Marketing Cloud, click Customer Attributes .
The Customer Record Sources page displays the attributes from the data file uploaded from your customer resource management source.
On the Customer Record Sources page, you can:

ol.li: Validate the schema and activate the record.
